ygData.subject: Re: Re: Subject: groups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I just found Luclin as a whole horribly underwhelming. The new class is rather uninteresting, the new zones when they actually work aren t anything
ygData.messageBody:
>I actually like it so far. the newbie area is pretty
>cool. lots of things to do and quests to do. there's
>an outdoor bank, merchants. all kinds of cool
>stuff. and you don't have to worry about falling to
>your death like in Kelethin.
>I also like how berries just spawn on the ground for
>you to pickup. sure you still have to buy drink but
>there's plenty of free food around.

I just found Luclin as a whole horribly underwhelming.
The new class is rather uninteresting, the new zones
when they actually work aren't anything special, and
the new graphics, well, they're shut off. (and the
models I turned on were all hideous, didn't like the
Dwarf or Halfling models at all, it's embarassing to
think I look like that to some people) Of course, I
probably wouldn't be quite as soured on it if it
wasn't for all the bad bugs and lengthy downtime right
in the middle of my usual play time. (generally play
from 2am til 6am PST, downtime was always 3am-6am) I
certainly appreciate Kunark a lot more post-Luclin
though. :)

> Or find a kind druid or wizzy who will do it for
> free or small donation.

10pp is a small donation. :) But yeah, that was
essentially what I was suggesting. I always made a
point of scrounging up the 10pp selling crushbone
belts when I wanted to go somewhere, and most druids
refused it, felt appropriate to offer though. :)
